name: NO SO' FREESTYLE
description:
"No So' freestyle" is a game inspired in Freestyle rap battles where you need complete the lines in order to win the crowd! 

Use cards to complete lines before the time runs out!

Instructions:

Red: Verb

Green: Noun

Blue: Adjective

This game was made during Winter Jam 2022 hosted by Jam2Jam with the theme 'Language'.
